price: Berdoalah kepada Tuhan-mu dengan berendah diri dan suara yang lembut.  Sesungguhnya Allah tidak menyukai orang-orang yang melampaui batas549.
arabic: ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ تَضَرُّعٗا وَخُفۡيَةًۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ
footnotes: 549.  Maksudnya melampaui batas tentang yang diminta dan cara meminta.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: id'ʿū rabbakum taḍarruʿan wakhuf'yatan innahu lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
